item.title: To Build Electric Cars, Jaguar Land Rover Had to Redesign the Factory
item.description: At Jaguar Land Rover’s historic Halewood factory in Merseyside, England, state-of-the art assembly robots are now building the cars of the future.

item.title: These Brilliant BenQ ScreenBar Lamps Are My Favorite WFH Accessory
item.description: Light up a desk with this space-saving lamp that hangs over your computer monitor—now with motion sensing.

item.title: These 3 Things Are Standing in the Way of a Global Plastics Treaty
item.description: Global plastic pollution talks have stalled—but a treaty is possible if countries can agree on finances, the proper regulation of dangerous ingredient...

item.title: Amazon Kindle Scribe (2nd Gen) Review: Room for More
item.description: The Scribe remains a great digital notebook for Kindle loyalists, even if not much has changed over the original.

item.title: 25 Work From Home Gift Ideas
item.description: Upgrade your loved one’s home office with these picks that make every day a little easier—and a little more fun.
